title: Revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts 2005 to 2015
summary: This graph shows the Revenue Starwood Hotels Resorts Entertainment generated with its Resorts business 2015 2005 to 2015 .
In 2015 , the Revenue amounted to 5.76 billion US dollars .

Starwood Hotels Resorts Entertainment & Resorts Revenue Starwood Hotels Resorts Entertainment draws Revenue 2015 the following segments of its activities : sponsorship and advertising , ‘ Artist Starwood Hotels Resorts ' ( artist management services ) , ticketing and concerts .
gold: This statistic shows the revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts worldwide from 2005 to 2015 . The hotel company generated approximately 5.76 billion U.S. dollars in revenue in 2015 . Starwood Hotels & Resorts was founded in 1969 and now has more than 1,200 properties worldwide .
